com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Logic


  • public interface Logic
    A Logic service that handles complex game logic.

    To implement a new persistence effect, see Spellsource.persistAttribute(String, GameEventType, Attribute, SuspendableAction1).

    • Method Detail

      • triggers

        static void triggers()

      • initializeUser

        @Suspendable
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.InitializeUserResponse initializeUser(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.InitializeUserRequest request)
                                                                                       throws com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                                                                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Performs account creation action side effects, like adding the first cards to the player's collection, defining their starting decks and in the future, creating friend recommendations.

        Some users, like test users or some kinds of bots, will not need starting decks or starting inventory.

        Parameters:
        request - The user to "initialize" for.
        Returns:
        Information about what this method did, like which decks it created and which cards the user was awarded.
        Throws:
        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • endGame

        static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.EndGameResponse endGame(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.EndGameRequest request)
                                                            throws com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
        Gracefully ends a game. This will return decks that are currently in use.
        Parameters:
        request - The game to end
        Returns:
        Information about the game that was ended.
        Throws:
        com.github.fromage.quasi.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • getDescriptionFromRecord

        static CardDesc getDescriptionFromRecord(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.impl.util.InventoryRecord cardRecord,
                                         java.lang.String userId,
                                         java.lang.String deckId)
        Converts an inventory record into a CardDesc, that eventually gets turned into an Card in the game.
        Parameters:
        cardRecord - The record from the database describing a card in a player's collection.
        userId - The player to whom this card belongs.
        deckId - The deck that the caller is requesting this description record for.
        Returns:
        A completed card description.
        See Also:
        for more about how this method is used.

      • persistAttribute

        @Suspendable
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.PersistAttributeResponse persistAttribute(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.PersistAttributeRequest request)
        Persists the requested attribute for an inventory ID.
        Parameters:
        request - The information abotu the attribute, inventory item and game necessary to save it to the database.
        Returns:
        The results to apply to the entity.

      • getDeck

        @Suspendable
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.GetCollectionResponse getDeck(com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.models.LogicGetDeckRequest logicGetDeckRequest)
        Retrieves a deck of a specific name from the player's collection.
        Parameters:
        logicGetDeckRequest - The request specifying the name and user ID of the player whose collection should be queried.
        Returns:
        A response containing the deck if it exists.
